message.name: ERR_FV_EXPENSE_TYPE_EMPTY
message.locale: The medical expense type must be entered.

message.name: ERR_FV_EXPENSE_FREQUENCY_EMPTY
message.locale: The medical expense frequency must be entered.

message.name: ERR_FV_EXPENSE_AMOUNT_EMPTY
message.locale: The medical expense amount must be entered.

message.name: ERR_FV_EXPENSE_AMOUNT_ZERO
message.locale: The medical expense amount must be greater than zero.
